rules.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(Production_Status__c), TEXT(Production_Status__c) = 'Approved for production', TEXT( StageName ) != 'Closed Won')

rules.description: Sends FedEx tracking number
rules.formula: AND( BEGINS(TEXT(Shipping_Company_E__c), "Fed"), ISCHANGED( Tracking_No_E__c ), NOT( ISBLANK( Tracking_No_E__c )), Block_emails__c <> True, CloseDate > DATE(2013,11,1) )

rules.description: Alerts customer of JAG air shipping tracking information
rules.formula: AND( BEGINS(TEXT(Shipping_Company_E__c), "JAG"), ISCHANGED( Tracking_No_E__c ), NOT( ISBLANK( Tracking_No_E__c )), Block_emails__c <> True, CloseDate > DATE(2013,11,1) )

rules.description: Sends TNT tracking number
rules.formula: AND( BEGINS(TEXT(Shipping_Company_E__c), "TNT"), ISCHANGED( Tracking_No_E__c ), NOT( ISBLANK( Tracking_No_E__c )), Block_emails__c <> True, CloseDate > DATE(2013,11,1) )

rules.description: Alerts customer of UPS air shipping tracking information
rules.formula: AND( BEGINS(TEXT(Shipping_Company_E__c), "UPS"), ISCHANGED( Tracking_No_E__c ), NOT( ISBLANK( Tracking_No_E__c )), Block_emails__c <> True, CloseDate > DATE(2013,11,1) )
